answers.answer: Hi, Dan.  I'm not a medical professional, just the parent of a kid with diabetes.  According to the NIH (http://www.nida.nih.gov/MarijBroch/Marijteenstxt.html#long), the drug stays in your body for several days.  My advice is to not smoke it at all, then you don't need to worry about how long it stays in your system.
